wikipedia_page.main: Benjamin Wentworth Munro Mike (born 24 August 1998) is an English cricketer. He made his List A debut for Leicestershire against India A in a tri-series warm-up match on 19 June 2018. He made his first-class debut for Leicestershire in the 2018 County Championship on 4 September 2018. He made his Twenty20 debut on 1 May 2019, for Leicestershire against the touring Pakistan team.

link_mentions.page: List of Warwickshire County Cricket Club players
response: * Ben Mike (2019) : B. W. M. Mike (2)
His son Ben Mike is a first-class cricketer for Leicestershire.
